description.value:
No two of these adornments look alike, but all appear to be mundane necklaces of little value.

Neck Slot: Uncommon

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Properties:

  • Gain an item bonus to Bluff checks equal to the trinket's enhancement bonus. While you wear the trinket, it appears nonmagical unless an observer succeeds on an Arcana check (DC 20 + the trinket's level).
  • Whenever you are subject to a divination or scrying ritual, such as Discern Lies or Observe Creature, the ritualist must succeed on an Arcana check opposed by your Bluff check. If the ritualist's check fails, the ritual doesn't work on you, the ritualist cannot discern the source of the failure, and resources are expended as normal to perform the ritual.
